attributes.action: To abolish the PIP system and put a fair system in place.
attributes.additional_details: If you take a look online there are various petitions I have now noticed for this subject which goes to prove how many people this is affecting.
attributes.background: On behalf of Fybromyalgia sufferers we are incensed by the amount of people who have either had their PIP stopped or can’t get it as they are deemed able to work. If a real doctor was to see these sufferers they would know it is not only physically hard but a mental strain too, people are suicidal.
